result.execSummary:
The defendant Daniel James Knopes was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Daniel James Knopes is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Daniel James Knopes was found guilty of OWI (7th), a class G felony, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: $1819 DOC Collect; If E.S. is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

records.addlTxt: Electronic Filing Notice-  ATTEMPTED NOT KNOWN, UNABLE TO FORWARD, RETURN TO SENDER (Defendant Daniel James Knopes)

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
IT IS ORDERED that the Department of Corrections will effectuate the change from Confinement to Extended Supervision upon receipt of this order, determining the actual number of days served in Confinement and changing the remaining Confinement to Extended Supervision. The number of days that are converted from Confinement Time to Extended Supervision will be determined by a DOC records office staff member and will be based upon actual release Date.
IT IS FURTHER ORDERED that the Warden/Superintendent of the institution to which the prisoner is assigned shall effect his or her release upon receipt of this order.

ADDRESS INFO for Daniel James Knopes
Current: W6898 E Staffon Rd, c/o Black River Correctional Center, Black River Falls, WI 54615-0433 United States  (Effective: 06-14-2017)
Prior: 3030 Westwood Dr., Janesville, WI 53548

Defendant Daniel James Knopes in court in custody with attorney Joseph Michael Freier.  Jodi Dabson Bollendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Deft pleads Guilty freely and voluntarily; Court accepts plea and finds Deft Guilty; Court orders: 3 years WSPrison, 5 years Extended Supervision; $600 fine + costs, DOC Collect within first 6 months of release to Extended Supervision; DL Revoked 36 months, Ignition Interlock 36 months; Not to drink and Drive, IS Eligible for Substance Abuse Program; IS NOT Eligible for Challenge Incarceration Program; 176 days credit.
